content: Formal notification that I received no community feedback about the removal of Patient.animal that you haven't already seen. You can discuss the feedback you've had since the request for community feedback (I remember there was a little), minute your discussion, and go ahead and close out the subject
@Brian Postlethwaite @Alex DeJong @Irma Jongeneel @Line Saele
ok, we were considering adding a boolean to patient and definitinely move the animal stuff to standard extension. That was the last status of the discussion, wasnt it?
I think we can complete this on the call this week.
